summary:
The Council extends the mandate of UNFICYP until 31 January 2016 and:

7. Expresses full support for UNFICYP.
8. Calls on both sides to engage with UNFICYP on buffer zone demarcation and the 1989 aide-memoire.
9. Calls on the Turkish Cypriot side and Turkish forces to restore the military status quo in Strovilia.
10. Calls for demining operations and access to deminers.

The Council also:

11. Requests a report on implementation of this resolution by 10 January 2016.
12. Welcomes efforts to implement the Secretary-General's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.
13. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
